```{r}
# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(rstan)
library(bayesplot)
library(bayesrules)
```

```{r}
# a
# STEP 1: DEFINE the model
bb_model <- "
  data {
    int<lower = 0, upper = 10> Y; // number of successes, it could be any integer between 0 and 10
  }
  parameters {
    real<lower = 0, upper = 1> pi; // probability of success, it could be any real number between 0 and 1
  }
  model {
    Y ~ binomial(10, pi);
    pi ~ beta(3, 8);
  }
"

# STEP 2: SIMULATE the posterior
bb_sim <- stan(model_code = bb_model, 
               data = list(Y = 2),  # observed 2 successes out of 10
               chains = 3,  # number of parallel Markov chains
               iter = 12000, # number of iterations per chain
               seed = 84735) # set a seed
```

```{r}
# b
# Trace plot
mcmc_trace(bb_sim, pars = "pi", size = 0.1)
```
```{r}
# d
# Density plot
mcmc_dens(bb_sim, pars = "pi") + 
  yaxis_text(TRUE) + 
  ylab("density")
```

```{r}
# d
plot_beta(5, 16)
```
